title: Energy Equity
description: The ability to supply the demand and energy requirements of the end-use customers.

sections.title: Definition in an Article
sections.body_md: > To address this limitation and integrate the engineering perspective of electric power systems with the concept of social justice, this Perspective defines energy equity as: Equal access to energy, equal affordability of energy, and equal ability to restore energy supply in the face of extreme events, regardless of the userâ€™s race, income, or social status.
